title: The Big day
creator_credit: Audio Visual Workshop and Chris Fitchett
brief_description: Suggests that one is wise to plan years ahead financially and otherwise, to be ready for retirement when the time comes. Cast includes Bill Kelly, Jennifer Hearne and Trevor Kilgour. Photographer: John Ruane.
